txt.en:
Hunulf is far from his dwelling in the Thornholt. He looks badly injured.

'[placeholder], is that you? Please listen.... I travelled from the Thornholt with Vaskorn, Threkmóth, and three dwarves. We came to warn of the growing threat. The warbands in the mountains grow more fearsome by day.... We made it to Limlók.... The village is not safe. They need help.'

Hunulf coughs and looks too weak to move.

'I was ambushed on my journey here. I narrowly escaped those wargs....'

Hunulf falls silent.

'Hunulf!'

Grimbeorn lets out a growl of mourning.

'Hunulf is our kin. I did not recognize him at the gate and now he has passed, shredded by the jaws of wargs. We must see that his death was not in vain. Here, take this candle. Light it for Hunulf at the Carrock. If you take the scholar with you, that is your decision. Just see to it that he does not die. I wish for no more deaths of those in my lands who I have sworn to protect. Our brothers and sisters in Limlók seek aid. You must go north.'
To the Floodfells

'This is horrible. I did not think I would be imposing myself upon the Vales in such a trying time. If Grimbeorn allows me to continue, then continue I shall. Do not worry, [placeholder]. I will not get in your way!'
Grimbeorn peers toward the front gate of the Beorninghús.\n\n'Now what?! Another guest?! We have not the time for this. [placeholder], see what they want, then send them on their way.'
Léothred can be found at the front gate of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should talk to Léothred.
Hunulf's death can not be in vain
<rgb=#FF0000>Mourn</rgb> the passing of Hunulf
Deliver Hunulf's last words to Grimbeorn
DNT
The small village looks tattered and worn
Talk to Hunulf at the front gate of the Beorninghús
Talk to Léothred at the Beorninghús before you depart
Limlók can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should travel to Limlók.
Runerik Knotbeard is the Thane of Limlók, in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should talk to Runerik Knotbeard.
DNT
Hunulf has passed
Hunulf can be found at the front gate of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should talk to Hunulf.
Grimbeorn should hear Hunulf's final words
'Now what?! Another guest?!'
'Please listen... '
'Hunulf!'
'If Grimbeorn allows me to continue then continue I shall.'
'Ba! I can not believe Grimbeorn sent you alone. Hmm, if you do not get in the way and do as you are told, perhaps you might be useful.'
Grimbeorn knows the threat in the north moves ever closer to the lands and people he has sworn to protect.
'What is it?!'
Hunulf can be found at the front gate of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should mourn Hunulf's passing.
'Hmm, the favourite of Grimbeorn returns. I hope you are ready to pull your weight around here.'
Grimbeorn can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should talk to Grimbeorn.
Light a candle for Hunulf at the Carrock
Travel to Limlók in the Floodfells
Talk to Runerik Knotbeard in Limlók
The Carrock can be found in the Beorninglands.\n\nYou should light a candle for Hunulf at the Carrock.

'Hunulf, my kin! I did not recognize him at the gate and now this news you bring pains me. Hunulf was an outsider, but kin all the same. We must see that his death was not in vain. You are willing to help, [placeholder]? I will gladly accept this kindness. Here, take this candle. Light it for Hunulf at the Carrock. If you take the scholar with you, that is your decision. Just see to it that he does not die. I wish for no more deaths of those in my lands who I have sworn to protect. Those in Limlók seek aid. You must go north.'
